name: lapa-casa-hostel-frontend
description: Sistema de reservas frontend para Lapa Casa Hostel - Rio de Janeiro

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run optimize
scripts.build:js: npm run concat:js && npm run minify:js
scripts.concat:js: cat src/js/config.js src/js/core/*.js src/js/business/*.js src/js/ui/*.js src/js/security/*.js src/js/main.js > dist/assets/js/bundle.js
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && rsync -avz dist/ staging:/var/www/hostel-staging/
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run test && rsync -avz dist/ production:/var/www/hostel/

author: Lapa Casa Hostel <dev@lapacasahostel.com>
